column2: "Iyinom nye nsɛm a Moses kaa kyerɛɛ Israel nyinara wɔ Jordan egya sar no do
column3: wɔ Araba Suf tsentsendo
column4: wɔ Paran

column2: "Ofi Horeb wɔ bepɔw Seir kwan do kɔ Kades-barnea ɔyɛ nda dubiako kwan."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a otsia eduanan no mu
column3: bosoom a otsia dubiako no ne da a odzi kan no
column4: Moses kasaa kyerɛɛ Israelmba no dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ no dɛ ɔnka nkyerɛ hɔn no nyinara;"

column2: "wɔber a oeku Amorifo hen Sihon a ɔtse Hesbon
column3: nye Basanhen Ɔge a ɔtse Astarot
column4: wɔ Edrei no ekyir no."

column2: "Jordan egya wɔ Moab asaase do
column3: na Moses hyɛɛ ase kyerɛkyerɛɛ mbra yi mu dɛ
column5: "EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn kasaa kyerɛɛ hɛn wɔ Horeb dɛ
column6: Hom atsena bepɔw yi ho akyɛr dodow:"

column2: "hom ndan homho
column3: na hom ntu nkɔ Amorifo nkokodo nkurow mu
column4: nye mbeambea a ɔbɛn ho hɔ nyinara
column12: nkodu esutsen kɛse Eufrates no ho."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: medze asaase no ato hom enyim: hom nkɔ nkɛfa asaase a EWURADZE kaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hom egyanom
column4: Abraham
column7: dɛ ɔdze bɛma hɔn nye hɔn asefo a wodzi hɔn ekyir no."

column2: "Na mekasaa kyerɛɛ hom aber no mu dɛ
column3: Mara nkotsee runntum monnkora hom:"

column2: "EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ama hom adɔr
column3: na hwɛ
column4: ndɛ da yi hom dodow tse dɛ ɔsor nworaba."

column2: "EWURADZE hom egyanom Nyankopɔn
column3: nyɛ hom dɛ mbrɛ hom tse yi mbɔho apem so nka ho
column4: na onhyira hom
column5: dɛ mbrɛ ɔabɔ hom anohoba no!"

column2: "Mebɛyɛ dɛn monko metum asoa hom haw
column3: nye hom adzesoa
column4: nye hom aperper?"

column2: "Hom nyiyi mbanyin enyansafo
column3: nye enyimdzefo
column4: na wɔda nsew
column5: dɛ mbrɛ hom ebusuakuw no tsetsee
column6: na menyɛ hɔn etsitsir wɔ hom do."

column2: "Na hom buaa me see dɛ
column3: Dza aka no oye ma hɛn dɛ yɛyɛ."

column2: "Nna mefaa hom ebusuakuw ebusuakuw mu etsitsir no
column3: mbanyin enyansafo wɔda nsew
column4: na meyɛɛ hɔn etsitsir wɔ hom do

column2: "Na mehyɛɛ hom atsɛmbuafo mbra aber no mu dɛ
column3: Hom ntsie hom nuanom ntamu nsɛm
column4: na hom mbu ntsɛn tsenenee wɔ nyimpa nye no nua
column5: nye ɔhɔho a ɔnye no wɔ hɔ ntamu."

column2: "Mma hom nnhwɛ nyimpa enyim wɔ atsɛmbu mu; hom ntsie aketseaba nye ɔkɛse nyina pɛ; mma hom nnsuro nyimpa enyim; na atsɛmbu yɛ Nyankopɔn dze: na asɛm a ɔyɛ dzen dodow ma hom no na hom mfa mbrɛ me
column3: na mintsie."

column2: "Na mehyɛɛ hom dza hom nyɛ no nyinara ho mbra aber no mu."
"Na yetui fii Horeb
column3: na yɛnantsewee faa sar kɛse a ɔyɛ hu a hom hunii no nyinara do wɔ Amorifo nkokodo nkurow kwan do
column4: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ hɛn no; na yedur Kades Barnea."

column2: "Na mesee hom dɛ
column3: Hom edu Amorifo nkokodo nkurow a EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn dze rema hɛn no ho."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze asaase no ato hom enyim: hom mfow kɔ
column4: nkɛfa
column6: hom egyanom Nyankopɔn aka akyerɛ hom no; mma hom nnsuro
column7: nkyii so mma hom akoma nntu."

column2: "Na hom baa me nkyɛn
column3: hom nyinara; na wɔsee dɛ
column4: Ma yɛnsoma mbanyin ma wondzi hɛn enyim nkɛsera asaase no mma hɛn
column5: na wɔmbɛka ɔkwan kor a yɛbɛfa do
column6: nye nkurow kor a yebodu do ho asɛm nkyerɛ hɛn."

column2: "Na asɛm no yɛɛ me enyisɔ dɛ: na mefaa hom mu nyimpa duebien
column3: ebusuakuw biara mu nyimpa kor:"

column2: "na wɔdanee kɔfoow bepɔw no
column3: na wokodur Eskol ɔbɔn mu
column4: na wɔserae."

column2: "Na wɔfaa asaase no do aba bi kitsae
column3: na wɔdze sanee baa hɛn nkyɛn
column4: na wɔbɛkaa hɛn asɛm see dɛ
column5: Asaase a EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn dze rema hɛn no oye."

column2: "Naaso hom ammpɛ dɛ hom fow kɔ
column3: na hom tseew EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn mbrasɛm do etua:"

column2: "na hom hwinhwinii wɔ hom asesee mu see dɛ
column3: Osiandɛ EWURADZE tan hɛn ntsi na oyii hɛn wɔ Egypt asaase do
column4: dɛ ɔdze hɛn rebɛhyɛ Amorifo nsa

column2: "Henfa na yɛmfa nkɔ? Hɛn enuanom etutu hɛn akoma
column3: dɛ
column4: Ɔman no wɔsoso na wɔwowar sen hɛn; nkurow no yɛ akɛse na wɔatotow ho afasu akɔ sor; na nkyii so yehun Anakfo mbabanyin wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Nna mesee hom dɛ
column3: Mma hu nnka hom
column4: nkyii so mma hom nnsuro hɔn."

column2: "EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn a odzi hom enyim rokɔ no
column3: ɔno na ɔbɔko ama hom
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛe maa hom wɔ Egypt wɔ hom enyiwa mu no nyinara;"

column2: "nye sar no do
column3: beebi a hom hun mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn sii tuur hom
column4: dɛ mbrɛ nyimpa tur ne babanyin
column5: wɔ kwan a hom nantsewee no nyinara mu araa dze bodur dɛ hom dur ha yi."

column2: "Naaso iyi mu hom anngye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn enndzi
column4: "ɔno a odzii hom enyim wɔ ɔkwan no mu dɛ ɔrokɔhwehwɛ beebi a ma hom abɔ asesee
column6: dɛ ɔkyerɛ hom ɔkwan a hom mfa do

column2: "Na EWURADZE tsee hom nsɛm
column3: na no bo fuwii
column4: na ɔkaa ntam dɛ
column6: "Ampaara ebusuasantsen bɔn yi mu nyimpa yi mu biara runnhu asaase pa a mekaa ho ntam dɛ medze bɛma hom egyanom no
column9: ɔno na obohu; na ɔno na medze asaase a oetsia do no bɛma no
column10: nye ne mba; osiandɛ oedzi EWURADZE ekyir koraa."

column2: "Eso hom ntsi EWURADZE nyaa no ho ebufuw
column3: dɛ
column4: Wo so ronnkɔ hɔ:"

column2: "Nun ne babanyin Josua a ogyina w'enyim no
column3: ɔno na ɔbɔkɔ hɔ: hyɛ no dzen; na ɔno na ɔbɛyɛ ma Israel enya edzi."

column2: "Nkyii so hom mbofraba no a hom se dɛ wɔbɛyɛ afonam no
column3: nye hom mba no a ndɛ da yi wonnyi papa anaa bɔn ho nyimdzee no
column4: hɔn na wɔbɔkɔ hɔ
column5: na hɔn na medze mebɛma hɔn

column2: "Na hom dze
column3: hom ndan homho
column4: na hom ntu nkɔ sar no do wɔ Mbɛw Po kwan do."

column2: "Nna hom buae na wɔsee me dɛ
column3: Yɛayɛ bɔn etsia EWURADZE
column4: yɛbɔfow akɔ akɔko
column5: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ hɛn no nyinara. Na hom mu nyimpa biara dze n'akodze miamiae
column6: na wodzii kan dɛ wɔrokɔfow akɔ bepɔw no do."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see me dɛ
column3: Se hɔn dɛ
column4: Mma wɔmmfow
column5: nkyii so mma wɔnnko; na minnyi hom mu; bɛyɛ na hom akɔtotɔr wɔ hom atamfo enyim."

column2: "Na mekasaa mekyerɛɛ hom
column3: na hom enntsie; na hom tseew EWURADZE mbrasɛm do etua
column4: na hom tsitsii hom enyi ho ara fowee kɔr bepɔw no do."

column2: "Na Amorifo a wɔtse bepɔw no do no fiir edzi behyiaa hom
column3: na wotsiiw hom
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ndowa yɛ
column5: na wokunkum hom wɔ Seir araa kodur Horma."

column2: "Na hom sanee na wobosui wɔ EWURADZE enyim; na EWURADZE enntsie hom ndze
column3: na eso ɔannyɛ aso amma hom."

column2: "Nna hom tsenaa Kades dzii nda pii
column3: dɛ mbrɛ nda a hom dze tsenaa hɔ tse no."
